subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia, led by Jrue Holiday, outscored the Celtics by 10 points after halftime as the Sixers won at home to force the first Game 7 between the old rivals since 1982.
snippet: Philadelphia, led by Jrue Holiday, outscored the Celtics by 10 points after halftime as the Sixers won at home to force the first Game 7 between the old rivals since 1982.
